title: Vanilla and honey honeycomb cake
ingredients: ['175g unsalted butter', '200g caster sugar', '200g plain flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 medium eggs', '2 tablespoon milk', '3 tablespoon clear honey', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', 'crushed honeycomb pieces', 'Icing', '1 tablespoon milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '150g icing sugar']
